channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: Tommy visits Westcliff-on-Sea in Essex to see a spacious five-bedroom end terrace, but will he be able to find the kitchen? Martel heads to St Leonards-on-Sea, where a spectacular Grade II listed former church is the property she's come to visit. Martin is in Stroud, Gloucestershire, where he visits a top-floor one-bedroom flat with some stunning views.
